metadata.synopsis: This guard is lowly backup, but eager to lord a position of authority over anyone they can.

0.speaker: Tracker Fezk
0.text: 'S good you ain't causin' trouble. Boss means business, now he's got the Absolute in his ear.
0.context: NodeContext: Tone of false threat - they've been handed a position of meagre authority and are trying to lord it over you.

1.speaker: Tracker Fezk
1.text: Before the Absolute, I'd've gut your kind without thinkin' twice. Funny, innit?
1.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful. Last line is bright, cheerful
